name: Cherry Picking
description:
A 2D platformer with gravity features.  Eat cherries and flip the level! Can you pass or will Gandalf win?

Controls (Keyboard/Gamepad):
A / LeftStick left - Walk left
D / LeftStick right - Walk right
Space / A-Button - Jump
Esc / Pause-Button - Pause

Made within 48 hours for the IIsterJam 2020, team SWT-P 3.
Themes: Two Sides, Eat It, Glitch

yes, there is no sound :(
